snippet.title: Titanium Hound - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Here's your look at Titanium Hound, an upcoming 2D retro-looking pixel art platformer game set in the cyberpunk genre. Check out the action-packed gameplay trailer for a look at the world and more. Titanium Hound is available now on Xbox One and Xbox Series X/S, and will be available on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, and PlayStation 5 on March 11, 2023.

In Titanium Hound, pilot a huge and agile exoskeleton to crush hordes of crazed security drones and abominations to uncover a conspiracy carefully crafted by one of the global corporations.
